translated: The One Hundred and One Groups of One

analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
translated: This was said by the Blessed One, said by the Arahant, so I have heard:

original: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanāhitāya bahujanāsukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
analyzed: eka dhammaḥ bhikkhave loke uppajjamānaḥ uppajjati bahu jana ahitāya bahu jana asukhāya bahunaḥ janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya deva manussāna
translated: “Monks, when one thing appears in the world, it appears for the harm, for the unhappiness, for the misfortune, for the bondage, for the misery of many people; for the harm, the unhappiness, the misfortune of gods and humans.

original: Saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne aññamaññaṁ bhaṇḍanāni ceva honti, aññamaññaṁ paribhāsā ca honti, aññamaññaṁ parikkhepā ca honti, aññamaññaṁ pariccajanā ca honti.
analyzed: saṅghe kho pana bhikkhave bhinne aññamaññam bhaṇḍanāni ca iva honti aññamaññam paribhāsāḥ ca honti aññamaññam parikkhepāḥ ca honti aññamaññam pariccajanāḥ ca honti
translated: When the Sangha is split, there is mutual criticism, mutual condemnation, mutual scolding, and mutual rejection.

original: Tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: tattha appasannā ca iva na pasīdanti pasannānam ca ekaccānam aññathattam hoti iti
translated: Those without confidence are not confirmed in their confidence, and some of those with confidence become otherwise.”
And in this connection it was said:
who splits the Sangha,🔽fond of factions, attached to views,

original: Kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī”ti.🔽Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: kappam nirayamhi paccati iti  ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
translated: He cooks in hell for an eon.”
This is the meaning of what the Blessed One said. Thus have I heard.
